name: Pim
description: Initially the receptionist at Dinkle Minkle metal company, Pim is known for her kindness, artistic talent, and quiet determination. Pim's evolving relationship with Jeff serves as a central storyline. At this point in the story she is very shy and reserved, but clearly has a lot of latent emotions she is too conflict-avoidant to explore, or even be honest with herself about. But her potential is clear.
motivations: I never want to cause a scene or any drama
